original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens stable at 326.60/90 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened stable at 326.60/90 to the US dollar on Friday.
The Colombo Stock Exchange opened up, with All Share Price Index up 0.32 percent at 10,747. The S&P SL20 was up 0.40 percent at 3,077.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 14.10/15 percent from 13.85/14.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 14.05/25 percent from 13.90/14.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.20/30 percent from 14.15/20 percent. (Colombo/Dec7/2023)
